#summary Description of the TPJOSInfo.Product class function.

= Product class function =

*Project:* [SystemInformationUnit System Information Unit].

*Unit:* _PJSysInfo_.

*Class:* _[TPJOSInfo TPJOSInfo]_

{{{
class function Product: TPJOSProduct;

type TPJOSProduct = (osUnknownWinNT, osWinNT, osWin2K, osWinXP,
  osUnknownWin9x, osWin95, osWin98, osWinMe, osUnknownWin32s, osWinSvr2003,
  osUnknown, osWinVista, osWinSvr2003R2, osWinSvr2008, osWinLater, osWin7,
  osWinSvr2008R2);
}}}

== Description ==

Returns a value from the _TPJOSProduct_ enumeration that identifies the operating system product. Possible values of _TPJOSProduct_ are:

|| `osUnknownWinNT` || An unknown product on the Windows NT platform. ||
|| `osWinNT	Windows` || NT (v3.51-v4) - needs major and minor version information to identify. ||
|| `osWin2k` || Windows 2000. ||
|| `osWinXP` || Windows XP. ||
|| `osWinSvr2003` || Windows Server 2003. ||
|| `osWinSvr2003R2` || Windows Server 2003 R 2. ||
|| `osWinVista` || Windows Vista. ||
|| `osWinSvr2008` || Windows Server 2008. ||
|| `osWin7` || Windows 7. ||
|| `osWinSvr2008R2` || Windows Server 2008 R 2. ||
|| `osWinLater` || An unknown version of Windows later than Windows 7 or Windows Server 2008 R 2. ||
|| `osUnknownWin9x` || An unknown product on the Windows 9x platform. ||
|| `osWin95` || Windows 95 or Windows 95 OSR1. ||
|| `osWin98` || Windows 98 or Windows 98 SE. ||
|| `osWinMe` || Windows Me. ||
|| `osUnknownWin32s` || An operating system running the Win32s platform. ||
|| `osUnknown` || An unkown operating system. ||

To find the string representation of the product name use the _[TPJOSInfoProductName ProductName]_ method.
